name: Run n' Gun (itch)
description:
Run n' Gun is a 2.5d platformer shoot' em up. We thought "What if we made Smash Bros, but instead of trademarked characters we made the characters guns with legs instead?". 

This game was made in 2 weeks by 2 handsome and talented young men at Yoobee School of Design for a project. 

This game is currently in an in-development stage, and as such is lacking a couple of the features a full release would have. Please, please please leave some feedback in the comments as to what you thought of the game! Was it fun? Was it boring? Too fast or too slow? What features you would like to see in it?
